drinks.name: Pour Over
drinks.fullDesc: A slow, meditative brewing process that highlights the unique characteristics of each bean. We rotate our single origins weekly and source almost exclusively from East Africa.

drinks.name: Cappuccino
drinks.fullDesc: The classic Italian preparation—equal parts espresso, steamed milk, and microfoam. Rich, balanced, and perfect for savoring slowly.

drinks.name: Latte
drinks.fullDesc: Our house espresso blend meets perfectly steamed milk for a smooth, comforting cup. A canvas for latte art and quiet mornings.

drinks.name: Mocha
drinks.fullDesc: Tcho chocolate swirled with our espresso and topped with steamed milk. Indulgent but not too sweet—the way chocolate and coffee were meant to meet.

drinks.name: Hot Chocolate
drinks.fullDesc: Made with Tcho chocolate, chocolate sauce, and melted cacao powder. Liquified in hot milk, and topped with a sprinkle of cinnamon. Pure comfort in a cup.

drinks.name: Matcha Latte
drinks.fullDesc: Premium ceremonial-grade matcha from, whisked and combined with your choice of milk. Earthy, smooth, and gently energizing.

drinks.name: Moroccan Mint
drinks.fullDesc: Traditional Moroccan-style mint tea made with spearmint, peppermint, gunpowder green - and weird herbs. Refreshing and aromatic.

drinks.name: Surprise Me
drinks.fullDesc: Feeling adventurous? Let our barista craft something special based on your mood and preferences. Tell us if you like it sweet, strong, fruity, or cozy—we'll take it from there.
